name: Feed Me, Please!
description:
Take care of your not-so-little friend Furry! You have to keep IT alive, or else the end will be pathetic...

Control player using left/right arrow. Protect Furry from bad things by bouncing them with your umbrella, and feed him by allowing things to fall into a soap bubble.

Do not move in one direction too long! You will make Furry dizzy!

Everything in game (music, art, code, etc.) was created during this game jam!

Have fun! :)
